job_tasks.phrase: helpt bij het trainen van generatieve AI-modellen
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly indicates the core activity of training AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: Het maken en beantwoorden van vragen met betrekking tot informatica om AI-modellen te helpen trainen.
job_tasks.justification: This describes a process directly involved in training AI models, specifically by generating and answering computer science-related questions.

job_tasks.phrase: Het evalueren en rangschikken van code die door AI-modellen wordt gegenereerd.
job_tasks.justification: Evaluating and ranking model outputs is a crucial part of the model training and refinement process.

job_tasks.phrase: ervaren software-engineer die zijn of haar expertise in codering wil inzetten om AI-modellen te trainen
job_tasks.justification: Identifies the role as a software engineer using coding expertise, implying development tasks related to AI model training.

job_tasks.phrase: Jouw mogelijke bijdragen: + Het maken en beantwoorden van vragen met betrekking tot informatica
job_tasks.justification: Creating and answering questions, especially in computer science, requires programming and logic skills, aligning with software development.

soft_skills.phrase: Er is geen eerdere ervaring met AI vereist.
flexibele werkuren, zodat je kunt werken wanneer het jou het beste uitkomt.

classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes training generative AI models and interacting with them, aligning with core GenAI Engineer responsibilities. While software engineering skills are mentioned, the primary focus is on the modeling and refinement of AI outputs rather than building production-grade applications.
